title: Haro Bikes Is Set to Release A New Race Road Bike and Gravel Bike. Wait, What?
content:
The brand best known for BMX and mountain bikes is getting in on the drop bar bike market with a duo of go-fast road and gravel bikes.

Read the full article at Haro Bikes Is Set to Release A New Race Road Bike and Gravel Bike. Wait, What? on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
